data.comment: The first-half is under way at Regenboogstadion - Zulte kick-off to start the match.
Olivier Deschacht has the misfortune to make it 0-1 through an own goal.
In the minute 19, Michael Krmencik puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
Goal! Brugge increase their lead to 0-3 through a well-placed header from Hans Vanaken.
Brugge move into a more comfortable 0-4 lead. Michael Krmencik is the scorer with a header!
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Brugge have kicked-off the second half at Regenboogstadion.
Zulte make their first substitution with Jean-Luc Dompe replacing Saido Berahino.
In the minute 66, Eder Balanta is on a sub for Ruud Vormer for Brugge.
Goal! Brugge extend their lead to 0-5 through Charles De Ketelaere.
Siebe Schrijvers is replacing Charles De Ketelaere for the away team.
In the minute 72, Youssouph Badji is replacing Michael Krmencik for Brugge at Regenboogstadion.
Brugge take a comfortable 0-6 lead thanks to Eder Balanta.
Brugge's Odilon Kossounou has been booked in Waregem.
In the minute 83, Cameron Humphreys (Zulte) gets a yellow card.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-6.
